response.overview: THE NEXT STEP IN SEXUAL EXPLORATIONS  Stimulate ideas for more fun in your own relationship by witnessing the variety in other people's sexuality. Enhance role-play and fantasy scenarios with this consciously adopted lifestyle that can provide numerous benefits when approached properly. Learn how to manage jealousy and trust each other when bringing a third party or another couple into your relationship. Experience the excitement of massage as foreplay, voyeurism, same-room sex, and swapping.  **Watching your partner be massaged  **Voyeurism as foreplay  **How to communicate and experiment  **Couples becoming threesomes  **Two couples becoming a foursome  **Swinging parties
response.tagline: The next step in sexual explorations
response.title: Swinging Lovers
